attributes.action: Reduce XS admin/middle management in universities to save core science departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the amount of excessive admin/middle management at UK universities in order to keep core science (Chemistry, Physics, Biology) departments open! In light that university of Reading is closing physics and yet hiring more and more admin staff, paid for by the student top-up fees! Universities should remain for education!
